hooks.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); cmd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".tool_input.command // \"\"" 2>/dev/null); result=$(curl -sf -X POST http://127.0.0.1:${CCO_DAEMON_PORT}/api/classify -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"command\":\"$(echo "$cmd" | sed "s/\"/\\\\\"/g")\"}"); classification=$(echo "$result" | jq -r ".classification // \"unknown\""); if [ "$classification" = "Read" ]; then echo "{\"hookSpecificOutput\":{\"hookEventName\":\"PreToolUse\",\"permissionDecision\":\"allow\",\"permissionDecisionReason\":\"CRUD classifier: READ operation\"}}"; else echo "{\"hookSpecificOutput\":{\"hookEventName\":\"PreToolUse\",\"permissionDecision\":\"ask\",\"permissionDecisionReason\":\"CRUD classifier: $classification operation\"}}"; fi'
